Data Fields
UART_Stats_t Struct Reference

UART Statistics. More...

#include <drivers/uart/UART.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t numRxInterrupts
 Number of receive interrupts.
 
uint32_t numTxInterrupts
 Number of transmit interrupts.
 
uint32_t numRxOverrunInterrupts
 Number of receive overrun interrupts.
 
uint32_t numDummyRead
 Number of dummy UART reads: Data was received on the console but the application did not provide a buffer.
 
uint32_t totalInterrupts
 Total Number of interrupts.
 
uint32_t numRxDMAInterrupts
 Number of Receive DMA Interrupts: This is only if the UART instance is configured to operate in DMA mode.
 
uint32_t numTxDMAInterrupts
 Number of Transmit DMA Interrupts: This is only if the UART instance is configured to operate in DMA mode.
 
uint32_t numFramingErrors
 Number of Framing Errors:
 
uint32_t numParityError
 Number of Parity Errors:
 

Detailed Description

UART Statistics.

This structure holds the statistics which are maintained by the UART driver instance and can be used for debugging purpose

See also
UART_control()
